M

main(String[]) - Static method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierApp
Main method launching the application.
Main - Class in JLex
Class: Main Description: Top-level lexical analyzer generator function.
Main() - Constructor for class JLex.Main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class JLex.Main
Function: main
MapDefaultPreferences - Class in documentclassifier
The purpose of this class is to mantain, in a structured and ordered way, two kinds of information for other classes of the program: 1 - The names of the various preferences 2 - Their corresponding default values In this way we add a level of abstraction for the other classes of the program, that need to use the static fields of this class to reference the names and/or default values of the various preferences.
MapDefaultPreferences() - Constructor for class documentclassifier.MapDefaultPreferences
This constructor creates a new map of names and default values for the program's preferences.
MAXKNNVALIDATION - Static variable in class documentclassifier.MapDefaultPreferences
The maximum value of K for the K-NN during the validation phase, chosen by the user through the window of the preferences: The K-Fold cross validation is repeated with different values of K-NN, from 1 to this value.
METRIC - Static variable in class documentclassifier.MapDefaultPreferences
The name of the current metric, used to calculate the distance between the query document and each document of the training set.
